name: space-app
description: This is an app created by react and node used for showing launches, upcoming launches and history of launch missions

scripts.install: npm run install-server && npm run install-client
scripts.watch: npm run server & npm run client
scripts.deploy: npm run build --prefix client && npm start --prefix server
scripts.deploy-cluster: npm run build --prefix client && npm run cluster --prefix server
scripts.test: npm run test --prefix server && npm run test --prefix client
